resources.string: Aldabra tortoises have a blackish brown carapace with a high dome. It has big and sturdy legs to support its very heavy body. This turtle has a very long neck used to reach branches and tree branches to a height of 1 meter more than the ground.

The Asian forest tortoise (Manouria emys), also known commonly as the Asian brown tortoise, is a species of tortoise in the family Testudinidae. This species is endemic to Southeast Asia. It is believed to be one of the most primitive living tortoises, based on molecular and morphological studies.
This turtle has a characteristic on the shell that forms a pattern like a star

Dog breeds native to the island of Bali
Dogs originating from Siberia that were originally used to guard livestock by the Samoyed . tribe
is a general designation for all types of twisted snakes classified as the family Pythonidae.
is the general designation for four species of deadly venomous snakes which are all classified as the genus Dendroaspis.
is a venomous snake of several genera from the family Elapidae.
